bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on March 27, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located 2127 Beatties Ford Road in Charlotte, North Carolina, as the Jim Richardson Post Office.
